content: LOT 1: 4x Moonbits 2018 Serie-T 1k silver alloy chips    #T2478: https://blockchair.com/bitcoin/address/1GfrFkvpGMSs44QGHCd1wZBWaySmS1rpL    #T2479: https://blockchair.com/bitcoin/address/1CRz42RGiWd21j8c5UHdNTHWwrdSHSPAEi    #T2480: https://blockchair.com/bitcoin/address/198ZL3quZF23pAc5dDDmsL2fi788nJn5Gm    #T2481: https://blockchair.com/bitcoin/address/1Q8c9GBdAKYtaURFwenxeL5a2T35cq9XM3**Bidding on this lot is for the number of chips you are bidding on and then the amount:    1 @ 0.001 btc, 4 @ 0.001 btc  and will work on a LIFO system. (Last in, First Out)LOT 2: 1x Moonbits 2019 Series-R 5k titan alloy chip    #R0421: https://blockchair.com/bitcoin/address/1zbooceQAKqKNEsdh5ogPYueNnXnQ35A3MORE INFORMATION: Moonbits Reference ThreadLOT 1LOT 2STARTING BID PER CHIP LOT 1: 0.0010BTCSTARTING BID LOT 2: 0.0050BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT PER CHIP: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: JUNE 11th, 2022, 13:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOTIf within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made PER LOT, 5 minutes will be added to the that lot from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC.
